channel.title: How do I set Server I.P in Client?
channel.description:
When I open up my client and try to sign in it says Unable to Connect.
Then I have to go to File > Change Server IP and manually type my server IP in to connect.
My question is how do I set the IP so it automatically assigns my server IP when the client is loaded?
Help much appreciated :D

item.title: How do I set Server I.P in Client?
item.dc:creator: @ownage5513 ownage5513
item.description:
@ownage5513 wrote:

im having the same problem, i went though changed it all and still wont run. cant some1 tell me what i did wrong lol

Read full topic
item.source: How do I set Server I.P in Client?

item.title: How do I set Server I.P in Client?
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

Thanks nelson, the first part worked, i found an changed socket and setserver,

but i don’t have serverip in gui.

I can’t test atm, but will consider this solved as i think that first part was the cause of my problem, if i still get an error i will edit this thread to let you know. =]

thanks for the help everyone.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I set Server I.P in Client?

item.title: How do I set Server I.P in Client?
item.dc:creator: @i_nelson_i i nelson i
item.description:
@i_nelson_i wrote:

open up client.java and search for both these

return new Socket

setserver

and change ip to yours

then in gui search for

ServerIP

and change it to your ip

Read full topic

I hope that helps
